body:
### Woah. SignalRamp preys on statis. Say what? Yay. **SignalR**amp provides the on-ramp for simple, multi-directional syncing of your UI. It uses [SignalR](https://github.com/SignalR/SignalR) library along with [SignalGrr](https://github.com/TimHeckel/SignalGrr) as a proxy server to wire client UIs together for immediate real-time updating. It's really easy: Given this HTML: ```
One Two
CLICK ME
...
``` This is all that's required to turn on real-time syncing: ``` $("#parent").signalRamp({proxyName: 'someUniqueName'}); ```
tagline: Dead simple UI syncing using SignalR
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
